selections.name: Master Lucky (AUS)
selections.reason: Won on debut at this track and distance with authority. The form looks progressive and he maps well from barrier 8 to stalk the speed.

selections.name: Packing Phoenix (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent performer who wasn't beaten far last start despite a heavy weight. Drops slightly in class feel and brings strong speed figures.

selections.name: Leading Dragon (AUS)
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start when fading late. With natural progression and a light weight, he can hit the board at odds.

selections.name: Fun Elite (AUS)
selections.reason: Second-up performance was decent. Has the ability to feature if he can overcome the wide draw.

danger_horse.name: Packing Phoenix (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Carries top weight but has the highest class rating in the field. If the pace is hot, he will be finishing strongest.

selections.name: Giant Ballon (IRE)
selections.reason: Recent form is solid with a 3rd place finish last time out. Draws perfectly in barrier 3 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Embrace Aberdeen (AUS)
selections.reason: Dropping in class and should find this easier. 5th last start was respectable and he has the speed to overcome the draw.

selections.name: Thousand Spirit (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent type who is rarely far away. The wide barrier is a concern but he has the tactical speed to slot in.

selections.name: Happy Brethren (GB)
selections.reason: First starter from a top yard. Trials have been encouraging and the market should be watched closely.

danger_horse.name: Embrace Aberdeen (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Class dropper who could simply be too good for this field if he brings his A-game.

selections.name: Beauty Missile (AUS)
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Happy Valley. Stays the trip well and draws a low barrier to save ground.

selections.name: Rattan Galaxy (NZ)
selections.reason: Has been running in better races. The wide draw is tricky but his class edge makes him a major player.

selections.name: Family Fortune (NZ)
selections.reason: Consistent runner who maps to get the run of the race from the inside gate. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Harry's Hero (GB)
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last start and seems to be peaking. Distance suits.

danger_horse.name: Rattan Galaxy (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: If he gets any luck from the wide gate, his turn of foot is superior to this field.

selections.name: Stellar Express (FR)
selections.reason: Group 3 winner over this track and distance recently. Maps perfectly from gate 2 and carries a competitive weight.

selections.name: Invincible Sage (AUS)
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Gives weight away but has elite sprint form. The main danger.

selections.name: Colourful King (AUS)
selections.reason: Runner-up to Stellar Express last time. Meets him on similar terms and should be right in the finish again.

selections.name: Magic Control (AUS)
selections.reason: Not beaten far last time. A step below the top three but can fill the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Invincible Sage (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Proven Group performer who could simply outclass them despite the weight.

selections.name: Smart Golf (AUS)
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start and draws the inside. Looks the most reliable proposition in a tricky race.

selections.name: Alabama Song (AUS)
selections.reason: Carries a light weight and draws well. Can improve sharply here.

selections.name: Quartz Legend (AUS)
selections.reason: Form has been mixed but has the ability to feature in this grade.

selections.name: Honorary (AUS)
selections.reason: Value runner who could sneak into the placings.

selections.name: All Round Winner (AUS)
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track/dist. Remains in the same grade and maps to get a similar run.

selections.name: Aerovolanic (AUS)
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent type who is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Smart Fat Cat (AUS)
selections.reason: Draws well in barrier 3. Can improve on recent midfield finishes.

selections.name: Win Ease (AUS)
selections.reason: Has class on his side but recent form is just fair. Respect the stable.

danger_horse.name: Aerovolanic (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Only narrowly beaten last time. If he overcomes the draw, he wins.

selections.name: Peridot (NZ)
selections.reason: Ran 6th last start but wasn't beaten far. In a weak field, that form reads well.

selections.name: Top Peak (NZ)
selections.reason: Draws perfectly in barrier 2. Has shown glimpses of ability that would win this.

selections.name: Proud Box (AUS)
selections.reason: Light weight chance. Can run a race at odds.

selections.name: Bright Day (AUS)
selections.reason: Horrible draw but has some back class.

selections.name: Ka Ying Rising (NZ)
selections.reason: Superstar sprinter on a massive winning streak. Won the G1 Centenary Sprint Cup easily. The one to beat.

selections.name: Lucky Sweynesse (NZ)
selections.reason: Top class horse who finished 2nd in the Stewards Cup. The main threat to the favorite.

selections.name: Helios Express (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent G1 performer. Likely to fill the minor placings.

selections.name: Galaxy Patch (AUS)
selections.reason: Talented closer but faces a massive task against the top two.

danger_horse.name: Lucky Sweynesse (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: Proven G1 winner who draws the rail. If the favorite falters, he is the one.

selections.name: Cool Boy (NZ)
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track/dist. Maps well and retains form.

selections.name: Eternal Fortune (GB)
selections.reason: Runner up last start. Draws perfectly to challenge.

selections.name: Lifeline Express (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent placer. Will be running on late.

selections.name: Packing Glory (NZ)
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Good barrier. Must be included.

danger_horse.name: Eternal Fortune (GB)
danger_horse.reason: Low draw and consistent form make him a major threat.

selections.name: Flying Luck (AUS)
selections.reason: Won last start over this track/dist. Wide draw is the only negative but has the turn of foot to overcome it.

selections.name: Lovero (JPN)
selections.reason: 2nd to Flying Luck last time. Weight swing and better draw brings them closer together.

selections.name: Without Compare (AUS)
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Maps for a soft run from barrier 4.

selections.name: Beauty Alliance (AUS)
selections.reason: Class runner dropping into a winnable race.

danger_horse.name: Lovero (JPN)
danger_horse.reason: Meet the top pick better at the weights and draws inside him.

selections.name: Six Pack (AUS)
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent and finds a winnable race here.

selections.name: Sky Heart (NZ)
selections.reason: Also runner-up last start. Wide draw hurts but has the class.

selections.name: Ka Ying Attack (NZ)
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Draws the rail (barrier 2) which is a massive advantage over the other favorites.

selections.name: Heaving (AUS)
selections.reason: 4th last start. Not far away and maps well.

danger_horse.name: Ka Ying Attack (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: Barrier advantage could be the deciding factor here.
